# Crystal Release: Jade Crystal Hexagonal Pillars

## Quick Facts
- Element/Type: Crystal Release
- Classification: Kekkei Genkai~Crystal Release, Ninjutsu
- Class: Supplementary
- Users: Guren
- Media: Anime

## Summary
By creating five large pink crystalline pillars around the user, this technique can be used to enhance the potency of other techniques. It was used to greatly amplify YÅ«kimaru's ability to the point that he could summon the Three-Tails, although with assistance from Kabuto's medication.
